name: NSViewAnimation.EffectName
desc: The following constants specify the animation effect to apply and are used as values for the animation effect property of the animation view. See the description of effect for usage details.

items.name: static let fadeIn: NSViewAnimation.EffectName
items.desc: Specifies a fade-in type of effect.

items.name: static let fadeOut: NSViewAnimation.EffectName
items.desc: Specifies a fade-out type of effect.
